statements: SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, driver_name FROM vehicles
SELECT driver_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car'
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'car' ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, driver_name FROM vehicles WHERE current_location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'truck' AND driver_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY last_updated_at ASC
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT vehicle_type, driver_name FROM vehicles WHERE last_updated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY driver_name
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE location_long < 0;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, end_location, start_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE location_lat > 30 AND location_long < -90;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' OR end_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%City%' AND end_location LIKE '%Station%' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model, registration_plate FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT trip_id, vehicle_id, driver_id, start_location_point, end_location_point FROM trips WHERE start_time >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT vehicle_model, registration_plate, current_location_point.STAsText() AS current_location, last_updated AS last_update FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_model, registration_plate FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number, status FROM drivers WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT trip_id, start_location_point.STAsText(), end_location_point.STAsText() FROM trips WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.driver_name, v.vehicle_model FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_number FROM Driver;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Route WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type='SUV';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model, start_location, end_location FROM Vehicle INNER JOIN Route ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = Route.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, location, speed FROM vehicles WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT trips.trip_id, vehicles.location, drivers.name FROM trips INNER JOIN vehicles ON trips.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id INNER JOIN drivers ON trips.driver_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM maintenance GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT alerts.alert_type, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY alert_type ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT driver_id, name, phone_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, start_time, end_time FROM trips WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT description, cost FROM maintenance WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT alert_id, vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
